summary: This bill, the Preserving Patient Access to Long-Term Care Pharmacies Act, amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide temporary supply fees to long-term care pharmacies for dispensing certain drugs to Medicare beneficiaries.  PDP sponsors and MA organizations must pay these fees for 2026 and 2027.  The Secretary of Health and Human Services will reimburse the sponsors/organizations, and the Comptroller General will study the economic sustainability of long-term care pharmacy participation in the Medicare prescription drug program, providing recommendations to Congress.
